column3: $First game at the new Yankee Stadium; Yogi Berra threw the ceremonial pitchFILENAME_TX"
Debut game for Anthony Claggett2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$a foul ball off the bat of Francisco struck the helmet of HP umpire Ed Hickox, cracking it; he left the field and returned with a Yankee catchers mask2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

umpchange,8,umphome,hallt901 umpchange,8,ump2b,(None) $HP umpire Ed Hickox leaves game and is taken to the hospital for observation; 2B umpire Tom Hallion moves behind the plate2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

replay,7,posaj001,NYA,crawj901,NYC21,I,N,I,,H $Trevor Crowe leaped in an attempt to catch the fly ball but a fan touched the ball, which hit the top of the wall and Crowe's glove before landing on the warning track; the play was ruled a homer but the Indians wanted fan interference; crew chief Jerry Crawford watched the replay and, after an 8 1/2 minute delay, upheld the call2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$Teixeira fielded the grounder, tagged 1B and then threw home; Posada chased Suzuki up the line before tagging him2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

replay,2,suzuk001,OAK,davig901,NYC21,I,N,I,,H $a fan touched the ball and the Yankees complained that the fan interfered with Johnny Damon's ability to catch the ball; crew chief Gerry Davis watched the replay and upheld the home run call; it was the second replay used at Yankee Stadium in four days2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
Yankees right fielder Nick Swisher left the game due to an injured elbow2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
Angels left fielder Bobby Abreu left the game due to an injured back2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$Yankees manager Joe Girardi and Red Sox 1B coach Tim Bogar yell at each other during Kevin Youkilis' at bat; Girardi moved down the dugout to get closer to Bogar; neither person would talk about what the argument was about2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,damoj001,P,bellw901,Called third strike $Damon ejected by HP umpire Bell for arguing called strike 3; he drew line in dirt to show where he thought pitch was2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
Twins third baseman Joe Crede left the game due to back spasms and a tight hamstring2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$Carlos Gomez ran past Mark Teixeira at 1B on the fair side of the bag2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$as in the sixth, Gomez ran past Teixeira on the fair side of the bag, this time running into Teixeira's glove on his left hand; that wrist had been injured earlier in the season and Teixeira yelled at Gomez; both benches emptied; Twins manager Ron Gardenhire and Yankees manager Joe Girardi yelled at each other during the incident but no one was ejected2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$Michael Cuddyer slid into 2B with a popup slide and returned to 1B; he was called out on appeal for not retouching 2B before returning to 1B; the run counted on the timing play2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

Orginally scored as S5, but rule prohibits awarding a hit when a runner is retired before reaching his next base2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$36 minute delay before start of game for rain that never appeared2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
New York Yankees pitcher Chien-Ming Wang left the game due to an injured neck/shoulder.2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,giraj001,M,fostm901,Call at 3B on Jeter steal attempt $Derek Jeter objected to the call at 3B; coach Rob Thomson pushed Jeter away from umpire Marty Foster; manager Joe Girardi argued with Foster about the play; Foster told Jeter and Girardi that the ball beat Jeter to the bag; it appeared that Jeter slid around Scott Rolen's tag; Girardi was ejected by Foster2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
Red Sox shortstop Jed Lowrie left the game due to an injured arm2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
Debut game for Junichi Tazawa2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$one pitch to Teixeira was high and inside, causing the batter to duck2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,ramir003,P,joycj901,Intentional HBP Red Sox pitcher Ramon Ramirez ejected by HP umpire Jim Joyce immediately after hitting Rodriguez; no warnings had been issued to the team even though there had been a few hit batters and close pitches in the series2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
ej,gastc101,M,schrp901,Balls and strikes Blue Jays Manager Cito Gaston ejected by HP umpire Paul Schrieber for arguing balls and strikes2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

replay,8,posaj001,NYA,westj901,NYC21,I,N,I,,H $Jorge Posada's fly barely cleared the RF wall over the glove of Joe Inglett; Blue Jays manager Cito Gaston thought that a fan interfered with Inglett's ability to catch the ball; crew chief Joe West watched the replay and upheld the call because the fan clearly did not reach out over the fence2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
Yankees shortstop Derek Jeter left the game due to an injured foot/ankle2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

replay,4,canor001,NYA,davib902,NYC21,F,N,I,,H $Robinson Cano's fly ball was fair by about two feet and cleared the wall by about the same distance; Rangers manager Ron Washington asked 3B umpire Chuck Meriwether about the call, so acting crew chief Bob Davidson watched the replay and upheld the home run call2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,rodra001,P,fostm901,Called third strike ej,giraj001,M,fostm901,Called third strike on Alex Rodriguez Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez and manager Joe Girardi ejected by HP umpire Marty Foster2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$the first pitch to Jorge Posada was behind him; he yelled at pitcher Jesse Carlson and both benches emptied2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

ej,posaj001,P,joycj901,Threw elbow at Jesse Carlson after scoring ej,carlj001,P,joycj901,Fighting Jorge Posada $as Posada crossed the plate, he stuck his elbow out at Carlson, who turned and yelled at Posada; Posada was ejected by HP umpire Jim Joyce and then Posada ran back towards Carlson; Joyce stepped in between; the two players fought and the benches cleared again; Carlson, who suffered a gash on the left side of his forehead, was also ejected by Joyce2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

umpchange,8,ump3b,millb901 umpchange,8,ump2b,(None) $3B umpire Cousins injured during the brawl when hit in the leg by a soda bottle thrown from the stands; 2B umpire Miller move to 3rd and game finished with 3 umpires2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$the shartp liner hit Red Sox pitcher Jon Lester just above the right knee and he left with a bruised quadriceps2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez started across the plate after the last pitch but since Red Sox catcher Victor Martinez was attempting to throw out Mark Teixeira at second base on a steal attempt and Rodriguez got in the way, interference was called on ARod and Teixeira was called out2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$Red Sox catcher Victor Martinez fielded the dribbler about 10 feet up the first base line; he dove back to the plate and tagged it before Yankees runner Derek Jeter could score2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
$the ball bounced off the top of the wall and into the seats2009NYA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
